name: Shmeep Shmoop ECGC Game Submission
description:
A platformer where your source of gravity is always the nearest surface!

You play as a sentient nanobot trying their best to repair a malfunctioning spaceship thruster from the inside. You're severely unequipped for such a task, and as such must gather a few abilities to aid you in your quest to purge the space ghost infestation!
